name: Small Water Elemental
conimmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Water Form
traits.desc: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Freeze
traits.desc: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Water Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.
